title: Can't log in to client at all???
body: I finished a ranked game and clicked 'Play Again' but it went to the overhead summoners/role indication map and stayed there. It then logged me out and now I can't log back in, it attempts for awhile until finally it says "The server log in did not respond" HELP?????{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: mine just started working, give it ago now people.
mine just started working, give it ago now people.

Hey Phantom Miria,

Riot is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. Check out the announcement by Agent Mindstar below:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kbVzswc0-login-issues-4th-feb-2016
I have got the same issue. I followed ALL the troubleshooting tips in the link provided after attempting to login. Maybe this issue is to do with Riot? I'm sure well get a fix soon.
I have got the same issue. I followed ALL the troubleshooting tips in the link provided after attempting to login. Maybe this issue is to do with Riot? I'm sure well get a fix soon.
im also getting this i thought it was just a repair matter ran repair after i still couldnt logg i searched for help and here i am finding that its not only me experiencing this

+1 This, I'm getting this too. I don't know why, the servers are working fine, and I was able to login fine yesterday

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ClBLrkH.jpg[/img]

i got 1 game in this morning at 8:30 nz time and tried to play again, would bug out and tried restarting client and yea same thing cant log in 
sick of this bs, same thing happened last week{{summoner:11}}
